name: workday-integration
description: A project for integrating with Workday

scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze-backend && npm run analyze-frontend
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage-backend && npm run coverage-frontend
